A Quote has one Quote Line for a subscription product with an End Date that differs from the Quote's End Date.
Which date will CPQ use to calculate the prorate multiplier?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
The order of precedence for evaluating subscription dates is as follows
(1) Quote Line,
(2) Quote Line Group, and 
(3) Quote
https://help.salesforce.com/s/articleView?id=000383503&type=1

comments.content:
From the link you posted, 
If there is a Start Date populated on every record, the Quote Line Start Date will take priority over the Quote Line Group or Quote. Even though there is a Subscription Term populated on the Quote Line and the Quote Line Group, CPQ will look to the Quote End Date first before looking at Subscription Term for this evaluation.
This explained it perfectly. Thank you!
